name: 达科·奥斯托吉奇
name_full: 达科·奥斯托吉奇 Darko Ostojic
introduction: Darko Ostojic was born in Bosnia and raised in Belgium. His introduction to the entertainment world began with his modeling career in Europe and shortly after the USA. Darko was also a band member of the pop rock group "Double Jam" which performed Michael Jackson's single "Power of Human Nature" becoming a hit in France and Germany. Darko continued to travel the world, quickly finding his way into film and television. Eventually redirecting his career from modeling and music to acting, Darko joined the world renowned Chippendales" tour in the U.S. and was immediately cast as a lead performer touring with the Broadway show for four years. His first film debut in the drama, "Invincible Scripture" released in 2011. In 2012, Darko was cast in the role as the Bartender in a short film called "Pact" and also cast as the male lead in a short titled "Jump Bitch Jump." In 2013 Darko co-produced and was the male lead singer in a new group "2 Mega" and toured Europe with the song titled "Super." In 2014, Darko was cast as the lead actor in a short film titled "Top Drawer." In 2014, Darko is currently in production as lead actor in the Independent feature film "She and I." Due to be released early 2015. In 2014, Darko is in co-production on a book titled " The big rubdown. Masseur to the Stars. A biographical story based on Darko's life experience as a massage therapist to the Hollywood stars and the rich and famous. Currently, Darko Ostojic shares his time between Europe and the USA. He speaks five different languages.
